story.text: We are proposing creating a series of integrated [[Livecode]] apps used for environmental education and showcasing these on [[Earth Day 2021]].

One component would be to create a Livecode library for interfacing with the [[expereince api]]. At the moment the focus is on experimenting with the following services:

- [[dsaf]]
- [[Scorm Cloud]]
